#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long ll;
ll n,t;
ll ans[65][65];
char a[65];
int main()
{
	scanf("%llu",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&a);
		n=strlen(a);
		for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		if(i>j)
		ans[i][j]=0;
		else if(i==j)
		ans[i][j]=1;
		else
		{
			if(a[i]!=a[j])
			ans[i][j]=ans[i+1][j]+ans[i][j-1]-ans[i+1][j-1];
			else
			ans[i][j]=ans[i+1][j]+ans[i][j-1]+1;
		}
		printf("%llu\n",ans[0][n-1]);
	}
	return 0;
}
